meta-runner.name: Custom Build
meta-runner.description: Triggers a build with custom parameters

param.name: system.buildConf.id
param.spec: text description='Identifier of a build configuration where to trigger a build' display='normal' label='Build configuration ID:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.custom.params
param.spec: text description='New-line delimited custom build parameters in the form: <name>=<value>' display='normal' label='Custom parameters:' regexp='(|[^=\s|]+=|[^=\s|]+\s*)*' validationMessage='Expected new-line delimited <name>=<value> pairs' validationMode='regex' allowEmpty='true'

param.name: system.username
param.spec: text description='Username of a user who triggers build' display='normal' label='Username:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.password
param.spec: password description='Password of a user who triggers build' display='normal' label='Password:'

parameters.param:
<project name="Custom build">
<taskdef name="http" classname="org.missinglink.ant.task.http.HttpClientTask"/>
<property name="reqParams.file" location="${teamcity.build.tempDir}/rawParams.txt"/>
<target name="prepare-params"> <echo file="${reqParams.file}" message="${custom.params}"/>
<replaceregexp file="${reqParams.file}" match="([^=]+)=([^=]+)" replace="name=\1&value=\2" byline="true" /> <replaceregexp file="${reqParams.file}" match="[\r\n]+" replace="&" flags="gm" /> <echo file="${reqParams.file}" append="true">&add2Queue=${buildConf.id}</echo> </target>
<target name="add2Queue" depends="prepare-params"> <http url="%teamcity.serverUrl%/httpAuth/action.html" method="POST" expected="200" printrequest="true"> <credentials username="${username}" password="${password}"/> <entity file="${reqParams.file}" binary="false"/> </http> </target>
</project>
